column5: My place is a 15-25 min walk (5-10 min drive) to Downtown, Discovery Green, Toyota Center, BBVA Compass Stadium, Minute Maid Park, and bars in EaDo (East Downtown). Youâ€™ll feel right at home dreaming away in any of the comfy beds, curling up on the cozy couch, cooking and drinking in the open kitchen & dining area, or knocking out some work at the desk in the guest bedroom. My place is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (not cats).
